text: Wilton Burton "Jerry" Persons (January 19, 1896 â€“ September 5, 1977) was an American politician. He was the White House Chief of Staff to President Dwight D. Eisenhower from October 7, 1958 until January 20, 1961. ==Other websites== *Records and Papers of Wilton B. Persons, Dwight D. Eisenhower Presidential Library *Finding aid for the Wilton B. Persons Oral Histories, Dwight D. title: Wilton Persons
